name: KAKUSANKIBOU / 扩散希望
description: Basically the story goes as visual novel form. Sometimes, the system switches into dot part, and you can control the character to continue the story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
